name: Winter Clash 3D (MrBhaer)
description:
Winter Clash 3D is a Christmas-themed battle of the Clash 3D series. You are on Santa's side against the evil elves. This is another amazing title from the exciting Clash 3D series and brings you more first-person shooter mayhem and action .You should never eat yellow snow, but red snow is much worse! Blood will practically cover the North Pole once the bullets start flying in Winter Clash 3D!

These Santas are definitely ready to rumble, and they’re anything but jolly!  You can jump into the middle of their endless battle in this multiplayer and very exciting winter game after you join the Red Team or the Blue Team. Not only do these Kris Kringles have machine guns, they've got sniper rifles and other awesome weapons! Take down your enemies as fast as you can, otherwise your Santa won’t have a very merry Christmas.
